attributes.action: Parliamentary / legal review into truthfulness of EU referendum campaign claims
attributes.background: Reason for serious concern that voters were misled by statements and representations made as facts that were central to the campaign for the EU Referendum. UK voters may have relied on incorrect statements in their decision making when voting in the EU Referendum.

rejection.details:
If you want a judicial inquiry into the referendum campaign, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139567

Alternatively, if you want a parliamentary inquiry, you could sign this:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/146016
